data.title: Legal Disclosures
data.meta_description: Explore Eyemart Express’s legal disclosures. We're dedicated to maintaining trust with our customers, ensuring all legal requirements are met. Learn more....
data.text:
Free 2nd Pair with Insurance (Upgraded $39.95 Frame):

Valid in-store only. Not all insurance plans will qualify. Includes eligible frames up to $39.95 and single vision, clear plastic lenses. Progressive and lined multifocals extra. For frames and upgrades exceeding the value of the promotion, customer responsible for the difference. Void where prohibited. Cannot be applied to previous purchases, Protection Plus package or combined with any other discounts or special 2-pair pricing. Excludes Ray-Ban and Oakley frames and ready-to-wear glasses. Valid doctor’s prescription required. Other restrictions apply, see store associates for details.

40% Off First Purchase + 365 Day Guarantee:

40% Offer is valid for new customers only on a minimum purchase of $100. Valid in-store only. Cannot be applied to previous purchases or combined with any other discounts, insurance benefits, or special 2-pair pricing. Includes Eyemart Express’s Protection Plus at no cost. Excludes Ray-Ban and Oakley frames, ready-to-wear glasses, contact lenses and gift cards. Valid doctor’s prescription required. Other restrictions apply, see store associate for additional details.

The 365-Day Guarantee is our Protection Plus Plan that covers all damages to frames and lenses. If you are dissatisfied in any way with your complete pair of glasses purchase, just return them to the store within 365 days of the original purchase date for a full refund or replacement. Does not include replacement for loss or theft. In some cases, customers may require an additional eye examination which is not included. Not all vision challenges can be completely corrected with eyewear. Other restrictions apply, offer valid in select markets, see store for additional details.

Online Sale Disclosures:

Valid online only. Discount applied to entire online purchase of 1 or more complete pairs. Cannot be applied to Protection Plus package, previous purchase or combined with any other promo code discounts. Excludes Ray-Ban, Oakley, Dolce & Gabbana and Burberry frames. Promo code must be entered at checkout to apply discount. A previous purchase of a complete pair must have been made in store, and a valid prescription on file, to purchase prescription eyewear online. Some prescription types cannot be purchased online.
